name: Tower's life
description:
A tower defense game where towers shoot other towers.

Controls:

Q - Speed up time

E - Open shop

Click on towers for info

***Please go into full screen otherwise the scaling is really bad***

Development - https://www.youtube.com/c/PhilDevelops

Music - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCej_F29hX9ZJxQKnieDHo3A
